mapper.select: select * from mt_goods t where (t.STORE_ID = #{storeId} or t.STORE_ID = 0) and t.STATUS = 'A' order by t.sort asc

select * from mt_goods t where t.STATUS = 'A'
and (t.STORE_ID = #{storeId} or t.STORE_ID = 0)
and (t.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or t.goods_no = #{keyword} or t.ID = #{keyword} or t.description like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) order by t.sort asc
select * from mt_goods t where t.GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} and t.STATUS = 'A'
mapper.update: update mt_goods t set t.INIT_SALE = t.INIT_SALE + 1 where t.ID = #{goodsId}
mapper.select:
SELECT g.LOGO as logo,g.STORE_ID as storeId,g.ID AS goodsId,g.CATE_ID AS cateId,g.GOODS_NO AS goodsNo,g.NAME as name,g.PRICE as price, g.STOCK as stock,s.`SPEC_IDS` as specIds,s.`PRICE` as skuPrice, s.STOCK as skuStock FROM `mt_goods` g LEFT JOIN `mt_goods_sku` s ON g.id = s.`GOODS_ID` WHERE g.`status` = 'A'
AND (g.STORE_ID = #{storeId} OR g.STORE_ID = 0)
AND g.CATE_ID = #{cateId}
AND (g.name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR g.GOODS_NO = #{keyword} OR s.SKU_NO = #{keyword})
ORDER BY g.`SORT` ASC
